author: zahary.
content: What do you think about the idea that the Launchpad could ask you regarding the beacon chain client you are planning to use in order to display instructions specific to that client? For example, we already have a command that can generate exactly the same `deposit_data` file as eth2-deposits-cli and when you use it, you can skip the additional step of importing the the keystores

author: carlbeek
content: What I don't like about this idea is that it erodes the concept of never letting your withdrawal keys get near your client, and the extended idea of doing key generation an air-gapped PC. That said, the UX is a whole lot better.

author: zahary.
content: Another crazier idea that I had is launching the Launchpad with an additional URL parameter that holds enough information to obtain the deposit data (e.g. it could just be an URL of the json file that the launchpad will download automatically). Since the deposit data doesn't contain sensitive information, this seems reasonable to do as a convenience
